= Introduction =

The supervisor service manager is used to start / stop the bungeni services.

Supervisor can be accessed via a browser -- on the host, port specified [http://code.google.com/p/bungeni-portal/wiki/HowTo_ConfigureFabricIni#supervisor_host_,_supervisor_port in the fabric setup parameters]

[http://bungeni-portal.googlecode.com/files/supervisor.png]

This page documents controlling the supervisor monitor using fabric commands run on the command line.

= Start, Stop the service monitor =

Starting : 

{{{
fab start_monitor
}}}

Stopping : 

{{{
fab stop_monitor
}}}


= Start, Stop specific services =

== bungeni==

Starting : 

{{{
fab start_service:bungeni
}}}

Stopping : 

{{{
fab stop_service:bungeni
}}}

== postgres ==
